references.reason: This paper is a state-of-the-art macro placement method that uses Bayesian optimization to explore the configuration space and improve DREAMPlace's performance.

references.paper_title: DREAMPlace: Deep learning toolkit-enabled GPU acceleration for modern VLSI placement
references.reason: This paper introduced a deep learning-based approach to macro placement that achieved state-of-the-art results and significantly improved the speed of the placement process.

references.paper_title: MaskPlace: Fast chip placement via reinforced visual representation learning
references.reason: This paper proposed a novel reinforcement learning-based approach to macro placement that uses a dense reward signal and achieves high efficiency and placement quality.

This paper introduced an incremental refinement approach to macro placement that effectively addresses the limitations of traditional methods by focusing on refining existing placements and improving PPA metrics.

references.paper_title: A graph placement methodology for fast chip design
references.reason: This paper presented a novel graph-based placement methodology for chip design that uses reinforcement learning and achieves significant improvements in placement quality and speed.
